original_response:
Steve eats 6 tomatoes per day, so in a week he eats 6 x 7 = 42 tomatoes.
        He eats twice as much as his girlfriend, so his girlfriend eats 42 / 2 = 21 tomatoes in a week.
        Together, they eat 42 + 21 = 63 tomatoes in a week.
        If a vine can produce 3 tomatoes per week, then Steve needs 63 / 3 = 21 vines.
        The answer is 21.

Hoja ifuatayo ina hali ya kutofautiana:
Steve anakula nyanya 6 kwa siku, kwa hivyo kwa wiki atakula 6 * 7 = 42 nyanya. Ili kupata nyanya 42 kila wiki, anahitaji miti ya nyanya 42/3 = 14. Jibu ni 14.
